text:
🚀 Exciting News! 🚀

We are thrilled to announce an incredible opportunity for students at our college! We will be hosting a comprehensive Gen AI Hackathon and Workshop that promises to be both educational and inspiring.

During the workshop, participants will learn how to create a full-stack web application using the latest advancements in generative AI. This hands-on experience will equip students with the knowledge and skills to harness the power of AI in web development. 

Following the workshop, we will dive into an exhilarating hackathon where students will have the chance to apply what they've learned and create their own innovative web applications using generative AI. The stakes are high, as the best project will win an amazing opportunity to attend the Mumbai Tech Fest!

We encourage all students to participate, collaborate, and showcase their creativity. This is a fantastic chance to enhance your skills, connect with peers, and explore the limitless possibilities of generative AI. 

Let’s embark on this exciting journey together and push the boundaries of technology! 🌟
